name: gpm_precipitation_yearly
title: Yearly GPM precipitation
description: Yearly IMERG GPM precipitation - aggregated by averaging the monthly GPM precipitation
details: Created by averaging the monthly GPM precipitation

extract_types_info.max: maximum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: G. Huffman, D. Bolvin, D. Braithwaite, K. Hsu, R. Joyce, P. Xie, 2014: Integrated Multi-satellitE Retrievals for GPM (IMERG), version 4.4. NASA's Precipitation Processing Center, accessed 31 March, 2015, ftp://arthurhou.pps.eosdis.nasa.gov/gpmdata/
